import React from 'react' import SlidesData from './SlidesData' import Slider from "react-slick" import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css" import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css" const Slides = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay:true, } return ( <> { SlidesData.map((path,index)=>{ return( <>

{path.title}

{path.desc}

)}) } ) } export default Slides
